snippet: Homeland Security ordered training for Transportation Security Administration officers who are accused of racially profiling passengers at Boston Logan International Airport.
abstract: Transportation Security Administration officers who are in a behavioral detection program designed to spot terrorists at airports are ordered to undergo special training after officers in Boston are accused of racially profiling passengers.
lead_paragraph: Homeland Security ordered training for Transportation Security Administration officers who are accused of racially profiling passengers at Boston Logan International Airport.

headline.seo: Mandatory Class for Airport Officers Accused of Profiling
headline.main: Mandatory Class for Airport Officers Accused of Profiling
headline.print_headline: Profiling Claims at Airport Result in Order for Training
